title: Traffic in towns: the Buchanan report
creator_credit: Realist Films, J.B. Holmes and Joe Mendoza
brief_description: Presents a visual summary of the findings of Colin Buchanan’s report Traffic in Towns, which is aimed at recommending measures to prevent Britain’s ever growing traffic from running to a standstill.
creator_credit_for_label: Realist Films, J.B. Holmes and Joe Mendoza
